(SourceFile 
  (PackageClause 
    (PackageIdentifier "main")) 
  (FunctionDeclaration 
    (Block 
      (Statement 
        (TypeDeclaration 
          (TypeSpec 
            (TypeIdentifier "p1") 
            (Type 
              (SimpleType 
                (PointerType 
                  (Type 
                    (SimpleType 
                      (TypeIdentifier "int"))))))) 
          (TypeSpec 
            (TypeIdentifier "p2") 
            (Type 
              (SimpleType 
                (PointerType 
                  (Type 
                    (SimpleType 
                      (PointerType 
                        (Type 
                          (SimpleType 
                            (TypeIdentifier "p3"))))))))))))) 
    (Identifier "main") 
    (ParameterList)))
